full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Title and Reference
- **Tender Title**: Custom Plot Seeder with Adjustable Row Spacing
- **Reference Number**: WS4279226925-Doc4373808587

#### Tender Overview
Canada is seeking offers from contractors to design, manufacture, and deliver one (1) Custom Plot Seeder with Adjustable Row Spacing for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

#### Contract Details
- **Contract Start Date**: N/A
- **Contract End Date**: November 11, 2024
- **Contract Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Identified NIBS/UNSPSC**: Not identified

#### Notice Type and Tender Method
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
- **Selection Criteria**: Low Price

#### Meeting Mandatory Requirements
Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the tender notice. Failure to do so may result in their bid being deemed non-responsive.

#### Instructions for Submissions
- **Proposal Closing Time:** January 10, 2024, at 1400 hours EST
- **Submission Requirements:** Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submission by the closing time to be considered responsive.
- **Additional Instructions:**
    All tenders must be submitted through SAP Ariba. There are no fees for accessing the information or bidding on SAP Ariba. Follow the notice on SAP Ariba at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322224.

#### Identification of the Sourcing Entity
- **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

#### Supporting Documentation
To access the supporting document, follow this link: [insert link]

#### Contact Information
- **Contact Name:** Nancy Baessler (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email:** nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Phone:** None
- **Fax:** None
- **Address:** None

#### Attachments
No attachments are available at this time.

#### Related Trade Agreements
Canada is open to receiving bids from contractors that have a trade agreement with the following countries:
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-UK Trade Contin
